title: Risks and Mitigations
body_html:
Risks and Mitigations

Risks

  • Performance impact on transaction processing
  • Incorrect event mapping causing noisy deliveries
  • Retry storms against failing endpoints
  • Security misconfiguration (secrets, IPs)

Mitigations

  • Use async queues; cap batch sizes
  • Incremental rollout with tests and audit logs
  • Exponential backoff + circuit breaker
  • Enforce HTTPS and signatures; secret rotation
  • Comprehensive metrics and alerts
